projects.name: Devops Portfolio
projects.description: This project is about the portfolio website you are currently visiting. It is a Node JS based website with help of express, EJS and Bootstrap. It is also implementing a pipeline using Github Action to shorten the development cycle.

projects.name: Movie App REST API

projects.name: Start Docker
